Hello, Kerbonauts. First of all, sorry for my bad english.

I made some mods for my personnal use before witch works properly but I can\'t fix some troubles on the parachute deployement. I try to edit parachute meshes with Blender, but when I import the .dae in game, the parachute deploys horizontaly.

My question is can I fix this problem with Blender? And most important, how can I fix it?

Thank you for advance.

Hi Yogui87

I have made one or two parts in Blender, and as you have seen for yourself the X Y Z directions are not what you expected.

Try rotating the part in Blender itself before exporting, I can\'t remember off the top of my head which way is 'up' so you\'ll have to experiment, but you may find some info here.

Hope this helps
Thank you, I solve all the problems with my parachute.
